owners.title: OWNERS:
owners.content: Please note that if you as an owner cancel a booking, the renter will receive a full refund.

renters.title: RENTERS:
renters.content: Please note that if you cancel a booking, the following cancellation terms apply:

conditions.1: - Cancellation at least 2 days before the rental period starts: 100% refund of the rental fee.
conditions.2: - Cancellation one day before the rental period starts: 50% refund of the rental fee.
conditions.3: - Cancellation on the day the rental period starts: no refund.

example.title: Example:
example.content: You rent out your sofa for Thursday. If the renter cancels on Wednesday, they will receive a 50% refund. If the renter cancels on Tuesday or earlier, they will receive a full refund.
